metadata.title: Learn to Smile Again
description: The Susie Arioli Band returns for their fourth studio endeavor, LEARN TO SMILE AGAIN. Featuring the guitar work of Jordan Officer, this album is a shining example roots Americana style music. The album focuses mainly on covering Roger Miller compositions, the lesser known ones, and gives listeners something new and refreshing to listen to. a must for fans of K.D. Lang, Emmylou Harris, Nanci Griffith and Cowboy Junkies.
